dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive Session Human Centered Design Building Empathy into the Design of Digital Health Solutions In this interactive session attendees will partake in a rapid design thinking exercise to learn how to build empathy into their design and development of digital health solutions and explore the case study of Leap a simple and intuitive mobile platform that is upskilling thousands of community health workers throughout Kenya to better serve the health needs of rural communities Attendees will take a journey in the shoes of stakeholders involved in delivering healthcare in rural Kenya and learn about the challenges of designing and deploying this integrated platform at scale By the end of the session attendees will have the tools they need to bring their teams clients and customers on a journey to transform the health and well being of patients around the world Presented by Natasha Suderji Business Strategy Senior Manager AccenturePrat Panda East Africa Lead Accenture
Human Centered Design: Building Empathy into the Design of Digital Health Solutions
